metadata.title: Create Event Schedule - Event Logic
metadata.description: Create detailed schedules for your events with our intuitive scheduling tool. Keep everyone on the same page with clear timelines and activities.

hero.title: Create Event Schedule
hero.subtitle: Create detailed schedules for your events with our intuitive scheduling tool. Keep everyone on the same page with clear timelines and activities.

timeline.title: Intuitive Timeline
timeline.description: Create visual timelines for your events with drag-and-drop simplicity. Easily adjust times and activities as your plans evolve.

sharing.title: Easy Sharing
sharing.description: Share schedules with your team, suppliers, and participants. Everyone stays informed with real-time updates.

templates.title: Templates & Automation
templates.description: Save time with customizable templates for different event types. Automate notifications and reminders for key schedule milestones.

step1.title: Create Your Event
step1.description: Start by entering your event details, including date, location, and event type. Our system will suggest a schedule template based on your event type.

step2.title: Customize Your Schedule
step2.description: Customize the schedule by adding, removing, or rearranging activities. Set times, durations, and assign responsibilities to team members or suppliers.

step3.title: Share and Collaborate
step3.description: Share your schedule with team members, suppliers, and other stakeholders. Collaborate in real-time with comments and change tracking.

step4.title: Monitor and Update
step4.description: Track progress during your event and make real-time adjustments as needed. Send automatic notifications to keep everyone informed of changes.

cta.title: Ready to create your event schedule?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of event planners who use Event Logic to create and manage their event schedules.
